room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: I really enjoyed this place!We had Do Not Disturb which was pretty cool. The effects were great! We were so close to breaking out, but got hung up on the last clue. Jake was great at giving clues that didn't just give the answer. I'll def want to come back and try other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Five of us did the Do Not Disturb room and while we were not able to escape in time, we had a blast! Our "game master," Austin, was great at providing clues when requested and giving us direction. We will definitely be going back to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: I had a wonderful time breaking out of the Do Not Disturb Room with my friends. This was a fun and different way to celebrate my birthday. I can't wait to go back!Marley rocks!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Marley (a.k.a. God) was a fantastic game master and gave my friend and I an amazing time breaking out of Do Not Disturb room for our first time. We were very satisfied and highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: We did the "Do Not Disturb" room today for my daughter's 18th birthday. I couldn't have picked a better thing to do for a monumental milestone birthday or a better place to try it for the first time. Our game master, Kayla, was great and made our birthday celebration extra fun. (And totally didn't judge us geeking on how much fun we were having!!) We didn't know what to expect never having done one before. It was a perfect level of tough. Enough to be engaging but not enough to make you feel like it's impossible. When we want something out-of-the -ordinary to do, we'll be trying another one of the rooms!!!! Thanks for a great time and fun memories!
